attributes.action: ensure that all politicians, civil servants and members of HMG utilise the facilities of the NHS to the total exclusion of private healthcare.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a matter of stated confidence in the National Health Service, it should be recorded as a condition of contract that all members of Her Majesty's Government, employees of Her Majesty's civil service and any individual receiving a salary or income mainly derived from public funds should be compelled to utilse the facilities of the NHS to the exclusion of any privately funded medical schemes.
